## WAV teams

.pull-left[

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/xX1dwuf8LN9YI/giphy.gif)

]

--

.pull-right[

- **W**rangle, **A**nalyze, **V**isualize

- Each team:
    - 4 statistics and data science majors (mostly juniors)
    - 1 faculty mentor
    - 1 **community engagement**-focused student

- `r icon::fa("money-bill")` stipends 

- Direct interface with community-based orgs

- Onboarding workshops emphasizing "soft skills" and collaboration

- Poster sessions

]
